TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, but its broken and on fire

I wish the kid beside me stopped annoying me

Granted, but he killed you instead

I wish for a good computer.

Granted. You can't buy it because its...

ONE MILLION DOLLARS

I wish to be DR. Evil

Granted, but its only a cosplay that costs 500 bucks.

I wish for a mundane penny.

Granted. CGP Grey and John Green now hate you.

I wish we could download information directly to our minds instead of having to learn it at school.

Granted, but it also contains viruses. GG your brain is dead.

I wish i had more charm.

granted, you re also the ugliest human on the world

I wish i didnt forgot my battery charger on guaruja

DARNIT NINJAS!

Granted. I forget your wish before I grant it.

I wish pizza.

Granted, its made of maggots

I wish i could teleport to anywhere on earth

Granted, but you can only do it when completely naked and you have no way to pick where you reappear.

I wish I could type faster / touch-type.

granted. you break your keyboard.

i wish for a wrench

granted, but its broken

i wish maggots were bigger

Granted, but they eat you.

I wish for a picard facepalm gif.

granted, but its corrupted and illegal

i wish 1.1 added a ROUND 0.625m probe core instead of the blocky thing

Granted. Good luck using a sphere with no nodes and no radial.

I wish AMD's ZEN would come out today and be super fast and inexpensive.

Granted but AMD goes out business and you don't get one.

I wish I was bald.

Granted. Everywhere is covered in thick hair except for your head.

I wish to record the launch of the rocket that sends satellites to Europa.

granted, but since it explodes, everyone says its your fault

i wish ace combat fictional planes were real

Granted, sir.

The Ace Combat planes are vulnerable to basic flint arrows and they get shot out of the sky by English longbow archers from back then, and rednecks with their hunting rifles. The air forces decommission the planes really quickly and they become scrap that everyone forgets, and the scrap turns into redneck houses.

So, Mr. Genie, I wish to separate the anime girl pics from my KSP GameData folder.

granted, but then you delete both

i wish i had a BAE railgun

Granted, but ammo and power geneatror is sold separately.

I wish I had _____________

granted, but it wrinkled into ~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I wish I could SHOUT ALL THE TIME!!!

Granted, But everyone thinks your obnoxious, You lose your job and your friends.

I wish I could build a Driller probe to Europa so I can see those damn Europan squids.

Granted, but it runs out of eletric charge

I wish i had Infinite dV

Granted, but you require an infinite fuel tank.

I need a cool. clean, refreshing, tall, 18oz, non-toxic, non-poisoned, no bugs, glass of kool-aid that is still produced and is very tasteful.
